Overview

HackerRank offers Events as a service to enable customers to attract new talent with the goal of brand-building or accomplishing the hiring requirements.
You can create Events and manage them. With Events, you can create a Microsite based on your requirement, add a Registration form for the event, create a Challenge, and then create Workflows to keep the candidates engaged.

Prerequistes

Add

Launch the Create Event Wizard

  • On the Create Event page, click Create Event. From the Create Event wizard, you will be able to create all the details for the event.

Create Event Details

  1. Once you launch the Create Event wizard, the Basic Details pane is displayed.
  2. Enter the event name in Name of the Event.
  3. Provide a Short Description of the event so that Candidates are aware of the event.
  4. The Microsite URL is auto-populated based on the name of the Event.
  5. Expand Event Timeline. Here you can select the start and end date for the Event.
  6. Select an appropriate Timezone and date and time of the event. You will also need to select the last date for registration.
  7. Expand Registration Form.
  8. Here you can add fields for registration based on your requirement. Click Add form field to add the customized fields.
    You can select the type of the field, such as the check box, radio button, and so on, from the Field Type drop-down list.
  9. Add the required Label and values for the field. You can also enable the field as Mandatory.
  10. Click Save. As an example, the form looks like this:
  11. Click Create Event. An event is created with the details you provided. You will then be directed to the Microsite Layout of the Create Events wizard.

Create Your Own Microsite for the Event

  1. After you create the Event, the Microsite layout of the Create Events wizard is displayed. You can create your own company Microsite for the Event.
  2. This layout consists of three templates for the Microsite. You can upload your Company logo and Header image and select the Brand color for your website. As you upload, the corresponding preview is displayed on the right.
  3. Click Continue. The Description pane is displayed.
  4. Provide a good Description for the event.
  5. Expand the Eligibility Criteria.
  6. Here you can add criteria for the candidate's eligibility.
  7. Expand Prizes.
  8. You can enter the reward details of the event here.
  9. Expand FAQ.
  10. You can add FAQs relating to the event. After entering a valid FAQ, click Add FAQ. The FAQ gets added. You can add multiple such FAQs.
  11. Click Continue. You are redirected to the Company Details section of the Create Event wizard.

Add Your Company Details

  1. On the About Company page, you can provide a good description of your company that will help candidates know about the organization they are taking up the challenge for.
  2. Expand Videos.
  3. Here you can upload marketing or introductory videos of your company.
  4. Paste the video link in Video Link 1 and Video Link 2, and the videos will get uploaded.
  5. Now, expand Links.
  6. Here you can provide the URL of your Website, Career page, and LinkedIn pages.
  7. Expand Testimonials to add testimonials for the website.
  8. Click Continue. The Microsite is ready.

Note: If you want more changes on the Microsite beyond what is available as part of templates, you will need to take help from the Professional Services team of HackerRank.

Publish the Microsite

  1. You can either Publish the website or Save and continue. You can always return back and edit the Microsite. You can publish the Microsite only when you have entered all the details for the Event.
  2. After you publish the Microsite, you can see a preview of the Microsite you created. You can also copy the URL of the Microsite to share it with your other teams such as Marketing.
  3. Click Preview. The Microsite is displayed.

The Recruiter should be able to see a registration link that gets generated after saving the registration form. This link should be unique to the event.
